mean_en: a belief, custom or way of doing something that has existed for a long time among a particular group of people; a set of these beliefs or customs
sentence: Dragon Boat Festival has many different traditions.
sentence_trans: 端午节有许多的传统习俗。
word_etyma: tra过 + di给 + tion名词后缀 → 一代一代地传递 → tradition传统
